transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Rishabh se connect karoge aap?
Customer: Uh, main unke manager bol rahi hu. Rishabh ji se baat karni hai kya aapko?
Executive: Hmm. Accha aap manager ho Amrita ji ka account aapke paas hai?
Customer: Haan matlab Rishabh ji ke paas hai unke upar main dekh rahi hu toh mere paas hi andar mein hai. Bataiye.
Executive: Ek minute, ek customer, ek complaint dali hai maine customer he is harassing like anything. Aaj subah 7 baje call aaya, theek hai? Us waqt kisi ne attend kiya hoga toh woh beech se chala gaya hoga.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Given the negative ratings. Kya usko call kiya hai toh immediately said ki hamara working hours 9 se start hota hai. Theek hai? Ho sakta hai technical glitch ho. Then he is screaming like anything one thing. Second thing he is saying I am putting 20 more fake reviews on you. IndiaMART. Okay, yeh aapko buyer bol raha tha.
Customer: Haan yeh buyer bol raha tha.
Executive: Theek hai. Ab hamara concern hai ki hum is tarike ke logo se kaise deal kar payenge?
Customer: Nahi toh aapke paas iske liye na Rishabh ne call bhi kiya toh then woh lekin aapko call uthana hi tha. Toh aap mujhe isme ek baar aap mujhe bhej paoge detail mein aapne likha toh unka number aur naam. But aapko kaise connect kiya us buyer ne? Toh kaise connect kiya us buyer ne yeh aap bata paoge jaise buylead ke through ya inquiry?
Executive: Buylead ke through nahi, woh hamare usme regular numbers aate hai na IndiaMART ka. Hamara IVR number us pe call aaya tha subah 7 baje. Theek hai? 7 baje kisi ne attend kiya hoga ya technical glitch hoga jab usko usne bola ki koi baat hi nahi kar raha tha, theek hai? Toh suddenly ki 7 am everyone is busy in their matlab morning chaos mein busy rehte hai jo bhi calls hote hai apne ghar ke kaam hote hai ya phir jo bhi hai nahana dhona jo bhi hai. Theek hai usko samjhaya gaya ki 9 baje se regular kaam karte hai. Toh usme negative ratings dali thi toh aap isko correct kar dijiye ya toh kya hata dijiye. Aur toh koi option nahi hai hamare paas mein ki 7 baje hum aapko is tarike ki service de paye. Then he was accha literally abusing. He is blackmailing for 20 more reviews such like this. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hmm. Aur yeh ek crime concern hai.
Customer: Toh yeh jo Sujit Kumar karke hai ek rating woh unhone hi di hai na aapko?
Executive: Hmm, yahi hai haan.
Customer: Okay. Aur ek jo 14 November ki rating dikha raha hai woh bhi kya isse se related hai?
Executive: Are woh alag hi prani hai. Usko toh humne details bhi bheji woh cheez woh change hi nahi kar raha hai. But the prime concern hai ki such people if they exist main aise logo ko bina complaint kiye toh nahi reh sakta hai. Kyunki yeh toh galat ho gaya har tarike se. Kya aapko situation aa gayi toh aap uska galat fayda uthaoge aap. Haan? Aur samne wale ko galiyan alag doge.
Customer: Aapke paas aisa kuch recording mein bhi hai kya ki unhone aisa kuch bola hai?
Executive: Recording toh nahi ki hai. Recording nahi ki hai. It is madam why should I want seven years from IndiaMART working. Paying the money, subscription money de raha hu. Theek hai Rishabh se aap mere bare mein puch lo. Agar aisa hota toh first day se is tarah ki complaints entertain kar rahe hote hum aapke sath mein. Genuine hai tabhi toh is tarike ki baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi main aap se isliye puch rahi hu ki agar aapke paas koi recording toh main woh bhi team ko aage forward kar dungi ki isko immediately sari cheeze uske according action lijiye isliye maine aap se pucha woh. Toh abhi is situation mein. Accha mujhe ek cheez isme aap jo bata rahe ho ki direct call aayi thi toh unhone koi matlab aap se requirement kisi product ki ya kuch buylead post ki thi tab call kiya ya kaise?
Executive: Are main call nahi samajhiye subah jab call kiya toh subah 7 baje ki baat hai. 7 baje call kiya ya toh woh unanswered gaya hoga ya beep tone pe gaya hoga ya technical glitch hoga. Is aadmi ne us base pe ratings dali ki mera phone nahi uthaya aapne. Jab isko call kiya gaya ki sir is time pe working hours mein kabhi kabhi subah morning mein bahut sare kaam rehte hai. Hamare bhi bacche hai hum bhi ghar ka kaam karte hai toh 9 baje se regular calls ka flow aata hai usme hum sabko jawab de dete hai inquiry hamare paas aa jati hai. Then he said ki nahi tumhara kaam hai tumhe 7 baje bhi uthana padega 6 baje bhi uthana padega. Theek hai uske baad gali dene laga phir kehne laga ki main 20 tarah ke aapke aur is tarah ke fake account se dal dunga matlab jo bhi account manage karta hoga. I don't know how much professional he is on that part, theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Toh main main woh cheez samajh gayi aapko aapko usne morning mein kiya call is wajah se yeh sara concern raise hua hai, theek hai? Ab mujhe yeh batao ki aap yeh buyer aapko kisi buylead ke through mila hai ya kaise matlab direct connect kar raha hai?
Executive: Nahi direct direct call aaya hai.
Customer: Accha direct aaya tha. Okay toh aap mujhe ek baar main aapko na whatsapp kar rahi hu. Mujhe ek baar aap usko lead manager pe aapke usme add ho gaya hoga na yeh buyer kabhi koi call kiya hoga hamare paas.
Executive: Main aapko screenshot bhej deta hu main.
Customer: Haan. Toh woh aap mujhe at least bhej do toh main na team ko raise kar de rahi hu uske sath toh accordingly jaisa action hoga aapko hum call karke thodi der mein ya jaise update aayega aapko evening se pehle pehle hum bata denge.
Executive: Action toh do hi ho sakte hai.
Customer: Block hi hoga simple si baat hai.
Executive: We want this to be removed. Theek hai rating. Second option yeh hai ki if you entertain such people how can we go further on that part ki jo subah subah hame gali de. Bhai aap se main kis time pe baat karunga working hours mein hi baat karunga na sensible hoke. Aur agar mere koi customer IVR bhi hai toh bhi main agar technical glitch aa raha hai toh uske liye aapko thodi na bol dunga ki madam yaar technical glitch tha aapka toh zimmedari hai aap us waqt kaise phone uthao. Woh thodi na kar sakta hai.
Customer: Nahi woh cheeze main samajh gayi but mujhe team ko yeh scenario main bata dungi toh uske according yeh cheeze na raise karke main aapko update de dungi ab team ke according hi action woh legi kyunki buyer ki jo handle karti hai team woh ek team hai wohi action uske accordingly yeh cheeze toh main waha pe bhi aapka concern aage forward kar de rahi hu. Aap mujhe ek baar lead manager wala jo screenshot maine aapko bataya toh mujhe Rishabh ko aap forward kar do ya toh main aapko bataiye whatsapp kar deti hu.
Executive: Main abhi bhej deta hu aapko, theek hai? Bas.
Customer: Haan Rishabh ka number hai aapke paas whatsapp pe?
Executive: Bilkul hai, hmm.
Customer: Haan toh aap unko bhej do woh mujhe forward kar denge.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer harassed by a buyer with abusive language.

- Buyer threatened to post fake negative reviews.

- Customer wants action against the buyer.



Resolution:

- Executive assured action will be taken.

- Customer to share screenshot of lead manager.

- Team will investigate and take action.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive an update by evening.



Alert (If Any):

- abuse

- complaint

- escalation



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- harassment, fake reviews, abusive language, action, buyer
